attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Oppose and stop elective abortion for personal or social convenience, instead promote adoption as a means of preserving the sanctity of life.

There are possible exceptions: 

• Pregnancy results from rape or incest

• A competent physician determines that the life or health of the mother is in serious jeopardy, or 

• A competent physician determines that the fetus has severe defects that will not allow the baby to survive beyond birth.
